message.content:
cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.SE

Reasoning: 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes a method for real-time voltage quality monitoring in smart grid systems, which involves control and monitoring of the power system. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory): The paper proposes a likelihood ratio detector for detecting disturbances in the voltage signal, which involves statistical signal processing and information theory. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper proposes a distributed monitoring scheme where multiple meters communicate wirelessly to a central meter, which involves networking and communication protocols. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes a method for detecting disturbances in the voltage signal based on an autoregressive model, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper proposes a method for real-time voltage quality monitoring in smart grid systems, which involves software design and implementation.
